      public OrderSummaryScreenController(javafx.scene.layout.HBox wholeScreen, Object prevController)
      Initializes the `OrderSummaryScreenController` with the given parameters.
      Parameters:
      wholeScreen - is for the screen to be displayed
      prevController - the previous controller from which data is retrieved

  • Method Details

    • initialize

      private void initialize()
      Initializes the order summary screen by setting up labels and displaying order details.

    • createCartItemCard

      private javafx.scene.layout.AnchorPane createCartItemCard(ItemInOrder item, OrderSummaryScreenController.Parity cardPlaceParity)
      Creates a cart item card for a given item and card placement parity.
      Parameters:
      item - The item to be displayed on the card.
      cardPlaceParity - The parity of the card placement (even or odd).
      Returns:
      The populated AnchorPane representing the cart item card.

    • goBack

      private void goBack() throws IOException
      Navigates back to the Checkout Screen.
      Throws:
      IOException - If there is an issue loading the FXML file for the Checkout Screen.

    • approveOrderClicked

      void approveOrderClicked(javafx.event.ActionEvent event) throws IOException
      Handles the event when the "Approve Order" button is clicked. Updates the server with the current order and items in the cart. Checks the server response to handle any errors or success messages. If the order is successfully updated, updates the customer's wallet balance Displays a "Thank You" screen to the user if the order is approved.
      Parameters:
      event - The action event triggered by clicking the "Approve Order" button.
      Throws:
      IOException - If there is an issue communicating with the server or loading the Thank You screen.

    • ThankYouScreen

      private void ThankYouScreen() throws IOException
      Displays the "Thank You" screen.
      Throws:
      IOException - If there is an issue loading the "Thank You" screen FXML file or accessing the dashboard.

    • backToRestaurant

      private void backToRestaurant() throws IOException
      Navigates back to the "Restaurant Menu" screen.
      Throws:
      IOException - If there is an issue loading the "Restaurant Menu" screen FXML file or accessing the dashboard.

    • showAlert

      private void showAlert(String title, String message)
      Shows an alert with the specified title and message to provide feedback to the user regarding errors or important information.
      Parameters:
      title - the title of the alert.
      message - the content of the alert message.

    • getOrderID

      public int getOrderID()
